title: The Billionaire Deception
description: A tale of stolen lives, and stolen hearts...  Erin Summers is delighted; with an interview for a role within the prestigious Hunter Corp sealed, she's one step closer to fulfilling her life-long goal. Erin, however, has a secret. She's no ordinary applicant...  Born Adele Morgan, the daughter of the late Sean Morgan, and rightful heir to the Hunter Corp business empire, Erin and her family were screwed out of her birthright by the nefarious and ruthless businessman James Hunter. Now, with a credible back-story and a route to infiltrate the company, Erin can finally take back what's hers.  With her plans finally coming to fruition, her continued association with Seth, James Winters' handsome, charismatic son and heir - albeit an heir to a stolen business - throws her ambitions and ideals into turmoil. Caught between conflicting desires for the man she finds irresistible, and the livelihood and birthright she feels is rightfully hers, Erin has some tough decisions to make...
author: Holly Rayner
